verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:5
verses.text: And he sought God in the days of Zechariah, who had understanding in the visions of God: and as long as he sought the Lord, God made him to prosper.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:6
verses.text: And he went forth and warred against the Philistines, and brake down the wall of Gath, and the wall of Jabneh, and the wall of Ashdod, and built cities about Ashdod, and among the Philistines.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:7
verses.text: And God helped him against the Philistines, and against the Arabians that dwelt in Gur–baal, and the Mehunims.
